name: Castle Smasher (itch)
description:
You are trying to conquer a sieged castle with a rocket powered catapult. In order to do that you have to squish all of the knights inside it.

You can shoot one boulder at a time. Reload the boulders at the boulder piles across the map.

Controls:

Arrows up/down - thrust up/down
Arrows left/right - rotate the catapult clockwise/counterclockwise
Space - shoot
Escape - exit
